DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Dietary Supplement Females With Cellulite
DOC.detailed_description: The study conduct single centre , randomize , double-blind , control , parallel group study healthy female volunteer , age 18-45 year age , skin phototypes I VI clinical diagnosis cellulite buttock ( least score 6 Cellulite Severity Scale ( CSS ) ) . The study take 24 week ( 6 month ) per subject . There one previsit screen phase 8 visit per subject treatment phase . Safety efficacy variable perform monthly .
